LanguageData.TwitchToolkitResetViewersWarningOne: this will delete all coins and karma date. Please do !resetviewers again to confirm
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitResetViewersWarningTwo: are you absolutely sure you want to delete your viewers? !resetviewers once more
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitInstructions: events/items can be purchased in game. Example: '{first} party' or '{second} beer 5'. Purchase list: {third}
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitWhatIsKarma: karma is the rate at which you earn coins. Buying bad events lowers karma while good events/items raise your karma. You are currently earning karma at a rate of
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitGiftCoins: you have been gifted {amount} coins from @{from}
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitModInfo: TwitchToolkit is a mod written by Twitch.tv/hodlhodl that integrates storytelling decisions into chat votes, awards viewers coins for watching, and those coins can be spent on items/events in game. Use !purchaselist to get more info. Join the discord
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitModSettings: Twitch toolkit is rewarding viewers {amount} coins every {first} minute(s), the store is {second} and coin rewards are {third}. Karma cap is {karma}%.
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitUserCommands: You can use the following commands:
LanguageData.TwitchToolKitVoteInstructions: Say the number of the option you want to vote!
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitNotEnoughCoins: @{viewer} you do not have enough coins. Your selected item(s) is {amount} coins. You have {first} coins.
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMinPurchaseNotMet: @{viewer}, your selected purchase price is {amount} but you need to spend a minimum of {first} coins
